data.eml:eml: Species of the genus Cestrotus Loew from China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Shi, Yang, Ding, Gaimari, Stephen D. (2009): Species of the genus Cestrotus Loew from China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae). Zootaxa 2009: 41-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185763
